channel.title: The Grand Indian Republic :: Tag :: Modnar Musings

item.title: Modnar Musings
item.description: The complete philosophical and professional profile of Vikas Chandra Thorian. The personal and philosophical profile of Vikas Chandra Thorian — a polymath navigating the intersections of mind, machine, and meaning. I am a strategist, technologist, writer and contrarian. I design ideas that survive; businesses and people that endure.
